data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test, Offspring Cohort Exam 8. Measurements include FVC 25%, 50% and 75%, FEV1, FEV3, FEV6, FVC, FEV1/FVC and FET.

variable.name: fv1_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory volume at 1 second - highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: fv6_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory volume at 6 seconds - best effort

variable.name: fv3_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory volume at 3 seconds - best effort

variable.name: fvc_8_1
variable.description: Forced vital capacity - highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: tfvc_8_1
variable.comment: This is the forced expiratory time of the acceptable maneuver with the highest FVC.

variable.name: rfev_8_1
variable.comment: Reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the pft machine (raw values with more than 2 decimals). All measurements were rounded to 2 decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FEV values were not within 0.15 liters (>0.15 L) - reproducibility criteria not met
Two highest FEV vaules were within 0.15 liters(<=0.15 L) - reproducibility criteria met

variable.name: rfvc_8_1
variable.comment: Reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the pft machine (raw values with more than 2 decimals). All measurements were rounded to 2 decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FVC values were not within 0.15 liters (>0.15 L) - reproducibility criteria not met
Two highest FVC values were within 0.15 liters (<=0.15 L) - reproducibility criteria met

variable.name: rbb_8_1
variable.comment: This is the ratio of the best FEV1 and best FVC, which can come from different acceptable efforts.

variable.name: mmf_8_1
variable.description: Maximum mid expiratory flow rate - best effort

variable.name: ff1_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory flow at 25% of FVC - best effort

variable.name: ff2_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory flow at 50% of FVC - best effort

variable.name: ff3_8_1
variable.description: Forced expiratory flow at 75% of FVC - best effort
